content:
# Feature: Silverchair - Journals option availability in OUP - Atlas Deliver screen


Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to journal Issue package and sees "Silverchair - Journals" option
Given I have navigated to a journal Issue package in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to Article package and sees "Silverchair - Journals" option
Given I have navigated to an Article package in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User does not see "Silverchair - Journals" option when not on a valid package
Given I have not navigated to a valid journal Issue or Article package in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I do not see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to journal Issue package without launching "OUP - Atlas Deliver" screen
Given I have navigated to a journal Issue package in Atlas
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I do not see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to Article package without launching "OUP - Atlas Deliver" screen
Given I have navigated to an Article package in Atlas
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I do not see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User sees "Silverchair - Journals" option in dropdown after multiple navigations
Given I have navigated to a journal Issue package in Atlas multiple times
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario Outline: BR-001: User with different roles navigates to packages and checks for "Silverchair - Journals" option
Given I have navigated to a <package_type> package in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”
Examples:

Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to a valid package but the system is down
Given I have navigated to a journal Issue package in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
And the system is currently down
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I do not see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”

Scenario: BR-001: User navigates to an invalid package type
Given I have navigated to an invalid package type in Atlas
And I have launched the “OUP - Atlas Deliver” screen by clicking “Deliver”
When I view the Workflow dropdown options
Then I do not see an option for “Silverchair - Journals”
